name: Chicken and Tomato Boti Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Chicken and Tomato Boti Recipe: Chicken 500 g Cumin (crushed) 1 tsp Tomatoes (cubed) 3 Oil 3 tbsp Garlic (chopped) 2 cloves Red chili flakes 2 tsp Lemon zest of 1 lemon Lemon juice of 1 lemon Yogurt 2 cups Cream Â½ cup Salt to taste Coriander (chopped) 2 tbsp Lemon 1
instructions: In a pestle mortar add cumin, 2 tbsp oil, garlic, red chili flakes, lemon zest, lemon juice and bash them Cut the chicken into cube and mix with the marinade Set aside overnight but in a fridge Add oil into the grill pan and add the chicken onto skewers with tomatoes Cook the chicken occasionally turning sides In a bowl mix lemon zest, yogurt, cream salt and coriander Add lemon juice and mix well Cover the delicious chicken sticks with the lemony yogurt and serve
